tr.th: **Work Experience Ericsson | HUNGARY | From 05/2021 to till Date.**

tr.td:
**Project name and Role** â€“ EO-CM/EO-cCM | Senior Tester/Test automation developer EO-CM manages hybrid infrastructure (mainly OpenStack, AWS, Azure based VMs). It also manages telecom software deployment (i.e. different kinds of network functions) on hybrid infrastructure. In other words, EO-CM tool manages machines (physical or Virtual) and manages software deployed on those machines
**Contribution** * Complete QA life cycle management - planning and execution of functional, non-functional tests. * Test strategy, test plan and testcase creation, implementation, and execution. * Validate the IT functional designs and business requirements for in-scope release components.
**Technology & tools used in this project:** Java, PostgreSQL, AWS, Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, Python, Groovy
